analysisEngineMetaData.name: LiaNETaggedTextAED
analysisEngineMetaData.description: * This AE is a wrapper for the LIA NE program. It does not use the original LIA NE main script, but instead calls the needed subprograms * through a temporary very small script file. This behaviour avoids the problem of converting numbers to letters (see {@link LiaNeRawTextAE}) * It tags named entities using the LIA NE CRF model, see LIA NE documentation. Only for French

configurationParameter.name: TimeOut
configurationParameter.description: Time limit before interrupting TagEN process (seconds). Default = 0 = no time limit.

configurationParameter.name: CharacterCodingErrorReplacementValue
configurationParameter.description: Replacement value for character coding errors. Must contain only one character. If defined, this value will be used to replace unmappable characters in order to avoid this kind of error. Otherwise such errors will raise an exception, thus usually making the process fail.

configurationParameter.name: RunIdValue
configurationParameter.description: Custom value that will be written in the "runId" feature of all output annotations

configurationParameter.name: KeepProgramOutputInView
configurationParameter.description: If this parameter is set, the program output will be written in a view named after its value.

configurationParameter.name: SentenceFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"

configurationParameter.name: TokenFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"

configurationParameter.name: PartOfSpeechFilter
configurationParameter.description: A list of conditions that the annotations features must satisfy to be taken into account. It must have the form: <attr>=<value> for example "runId=myRunIdValue", "componentId=myComponentIdValue"
